Q&A 1

Q: Is AI taking CS jobs?

For individuals who have poor code structure, lack diversity of applicable skills, and are pure DS majors — yes. Otherwise you're fine.

Q: Is Quantum Computing even real?

Ask yourself: What does it mean for something to be real? Do you need to see it? Or simply believe in it? Is it something that is proven? If you're looking for an opinion from me then the answer is yes. (I know nothing about philosophy)

Q: How to get "cracked"?

Don't.

Q: TypeScript?

A bad day writing code in C++ is better than a good day writing code in TypeScript — David Stigant (Surely)
